title: Crash building libstd on FreeBSD after miri const eval changes.

labels.name: I-crash
labels.description: Issue: The compiler crashes (SIGSEGV, SIGABRT, etc). Use I-ICE instead when the compiler panics.

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: A-const-fn
labels.description: Area: const fn foo(..) {..}. Pure functions which can be applied at compile time.

body:
Bisecting it seems to be an issue with #46882.
It appears this may be a double crash? Like it's hitting some error and then unwinding improperly and crashing again. Not familiar enough with the traces to know.
